```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

data_folder <- "~/OneDrive - Havforskningsinstituttet/Are Marine Nanoparticles/Experimental results/SYNC_TEST/20190717_quantification_CRM-2.b/"
source("r/sp_funs.R")
```

##


```{r classification}
tic("classifier")
classified <- data_folder %>% sp_classifier(RM_string = "AuNPs")
toc("classifier")
```


```{r particles}

{tic("particles")
peaked <- sp_peaker(classified)
toc("particles")}
```


```{r, warning=FALSE}
{tic("cal")
calibration_data <- sp_calibrator(classified, RM_dia = 27.6)
toc("cal")}
```

```{r}
tic("pout")
particles_out <- sp_outputer(peaked, calibration_data, dens_comps, RM_isotope = "Au", sample_intake_rate = 0.312)
toc("pout")
```


```{r}
tic("wraptesting")
wraptest2 <- sp_wrapper(data_folder, acq_time = 60, sample_intake_rate = 0.312, RM_string = "AuNPs", dens_comps = dens_comps, RM_isotope = "Au")
toc("wraptesting")
```
